duties_responsibilities.duty: Support and execute communication strategies for the regional department using BMW corporate identity and design standards.
Develop assets for the IT team to utilize and curate content for those assets.
Write communications, including articles, newsletters, and editorial components.
Transform and create content to meet BMW CI and technical design requirements.

education_certification.credential: Arts/Graphic Design or UX design (highly preferred)
Experience in writing communications for content creation (newsletters, articles etc.)
